article_title: Alfred J. Martello: Important policies, regulations go unnoticed amid election-year circus

article_metadata.description: Many of us have been preoccupied with the circus that is the 2016 presidential election. However, sometimes while our attention is diverted, important policies and regulations get implemented
article_metadata.author: Alfred J. Martello
